meanings.sent1: The iron bar is magnetizable and can be attracted to a magnet.
meanings.sent2: The magnetizable material easily responds to a magnetic field.
meanings.sent3: The toy car became magnetizable after it accidentally stuck to the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her words were so powerful, they were magnetizable to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The scientist demonstrated how the paperclip became magnetizable by using a strong magnet.

meanings.sent1: The magnetizable metal became a magnet when exposed to a magnetic field.
meanings.sent2: Certain metals are naturally magnetizable and can attract other objects.
meanings.sent3: The cat's collar was so magnetizable that it attracted all the metal objects in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so warm and inviting, it made her magnetizable to new friends.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's suit was specially designed to be magnetizable to help him climb buildings.

meanings.sent1: The magnetizable material quickly became attracted to the magnet.
meanings.sent2: Objects made of magnetizable material can easily become magnetized.
meanings.sent3: The robot's circuits were so magnetizable that it kept getting stuck to the metal door.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was magnetizable to his kind gestures and affection.
meanings.sent5: The old ship's hull was magnetizable, causing it to attract underwater debris.
